component.name: LAMMPS-GUI
component.summary: Graphical interface to edit, run, plot, and visualize simulations with the LAMMPS MD code

description.p: LAMMPS-GUI is an editor customized for editing input files for the LAMMPS MD simulation software. It also includes LAMMPS and thus can run it directly from the GUI. Furthermore it has facilities to create or view and animate snapshot images, monitor and plot thermodynamic properties and show the console output of the running simulation.

release.description: Add dialog to enable and configure atom / particle visualization settings Add dialog to enable and configure graphics objects from compute and fixes Update layout of Image and SlideShow viewers Update docs for changes to Image and SlideShow viewers Update help index table Add table for known fixes and computes with graphics data Update resource file syntax for better Windows compatibility Fix several small glitches and avoid unexpected crashes

Small tweaks to the theme colors in use Update, correct, and reformat installation and compilation instructions Use new library interface call to determine if LAMMPS supports OpenMP remove all remaining ifdefs for _OPENMP When loading library plugin, check if required recently added functions are present and also check the version string. Use GitHub Action to translate and deploy docs at online website. Remove workarounds for compatibility with Qt 5.12 on Ubuntu 20.04LTS.
